name: Loose Cards
description:
Simple and fast card game. Amusing and entertaining to kill a few minutes.

Played by travelers and students all around the world. Funny game that's easy to learn and play. The app supports different rules for different game types as the original game is known by another name and played different in different regions.
Play against a challenging ai opponent that's trying to beat you.
The game is also more widely known as shithead.

Gives informative statistics about your played games. You can see your winrate and improve your game play.

A multiplayer mode allows you to play other players. A leaderboard keeps track of the best players. A challenging and motivating mode to play the game.
